title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-8.12 - Payments for extended hours of operation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-8.12 - Payments for extended hours of operation

State Regulations
for visits occurring on and after January 1, 2009, by hospital outpatient clinics and diagnostic and treatment centers otherwise subject to this Subpart, which are scheduled and occur on evenings, weekends and holidays as defined by the department, a supplemental APG payment amount, as determined in accordance with section
86-8.7
of this Subpart, shall be added on to the otherwise applicable payment amount for each such visit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-8.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
